thread.title: BRIEF-Verizon, CONCACAF Kick Off Multi-Platform Media Partnership

title: BRIEF-Verizon, CONCACAF Kick Off Multi-Platform Media Partnership
text: February 27, 2018 / 3:39 PM / in 20 minutes BRIEF-Verizon, CONCACAF Kick Off Multi-Platform Media Partnership Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Verizon Communications Inc: * VERIZON AND CONCACAF KICK OFF EXCLUSIVE MULTI-PLATFORM MEDIA PARTNERSHIP * ADDITIONAL TERMS OF DEAL WERE NOT DISCLOSED​ * ‍DEAL GIVES VERIZON EXCLUSIVE ENGLISH LANGUAGE RIGHTS TO DISTRIBUTE MULTIPLE CONFEDERATION CHAMPIONSHIPS​ * DEAL TO DISTRIBUTE CONFEDERATION OF NORTH, CENTRAL AMERICAN AND CARIBBEAN ASSOCIATION FOOTBALL​ (CONCACAF) TOURNAMENTS ACROSS CO‘S DIGITAL MEDIA PLATFORMS * PEOPLE IN CANADA, MEXICO AND CARIBBEAN WILL ALSO BE ABLE TO VIEW SELECT CONCACAF TOURNAMENTS ON CO‘S DIGITAL PLATFORMS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
